Package main

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CritPotion, DamagePotion, HealthPotion, LevelPotion
public abstract class Item extends Object implements Purchasable
An abstract class that describes an item that can be used on a monster.
Author:
Farzad and Daniel

      public Item(String name, String description, int cost)

      description - the given description
      cost - the given cost

    • buy

      public String buy() throws InsufficientFundsException, InvalidValueException, InventoryFullException
      Buy this item from the shop and add it to the player inventory.
      Returns:
      the string representing what the player bought
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if cost of item is more than player balance
      InvalidValueException - if cost is a negative value
      InventoryFullException - if the player item inventory is full

    • sell

      public String sell() throws InvalidValueException
      Sell this item back to the shop for a partial refund and remove the item from the player inventory.
      Returns:
      the string representing what the player sold
      Throws:
      InvalidValueException - if (cost * refundAmount) is a negative value

    • use

      public abstract void use(Monster monster) throws StatMaxedOutException
      Use this item on the given Monster
      Parameters:
      monster - the given monster
      Throws:
      StatMaxedOutException - if the monster is already maxed out in the stat that the item is upgrading

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representation of the Item object.

    • view

      public String view()
      Returns:
      a string representation of the Item object with full details and command line options.
